import { Playground, Props } from 'docz'
import { LineChart } from '@ichef/transcharts-chart'
import { Theme, ThemeProvider } from '@ichef/transcharts-graph'
import lineData from '../sampleData/lineData';
import { redTheme as customRedTheme } from './customThemes';

# Theme

By default, we have a default theme in `transchart` so you can directly render Chart component.
However, if you'd like to customize theme for your chart, you could use `ThemeProvider`.
Wrapping the charts where you want to customize with `ThemeProvider`, pass your custom theme object, and it's done.
The theme object could be partial of theme.

## Example: Line Chart

We use the following example data to generate the example charts below.

**Example Data and red theme:**

```js
const lineData = [
  { x: 0, y: 9, date: '2019/01/21 00:00:00', weekday: 'Mon' },
  { x: 1, y: 5, date: '2019/01/22 00:00:00', weekday: 'Tue' },
  { x: 2, y: 5, date: '2019/01/23 00:00:00', weekday: 'Wed' },
  { x: 3, y: 3, date: '2019/01/24 00:00:00', weekday: 'Thu'},
  { x: 4, y: 1, date: '2019/01/25 00:00:00', weekday: 'Fri' },
];
const customRedTheme = {
  colors: {
    category: ['#d01040']
  },
  xAxis: {
    strokeColor: '#d01040',
    tickStrokeColor: '#d01040',
  },
  yAxis: {
    strokeColor: '#d01040',
    tickStrokeColor: '#d01040',
  },
}
```

<Playground>
  <div style={{ width: '100%', height: '320px' }}>
    <ThemeProvider theme={customRedTheme}>
      <LineChart
        data={lineData}
        x={{ field: 'x', type: 'quantitative', scale: 'linear' }}
        y={{ field: 'y', type: 'quantitative', scale: 'linear' }}
      />
    </ThemeProvider>
  </div>
</Playground>

## propTypes

<Props of={ThemeProvider} />

the `theme` type has following attributes:

## `theme` attributes:

```js

{
  /** common colors */
  colors: {
    /** colors used for nominal data */
    category: ReadonlyArray<string>;

    sequential: {
      scheme: ReadonlyArray<ReadonlyArray<string>>;
      interpolator: (val: number) => string;
    }
  };

  /** Global style settings for the charts */
  globalStyle: {
    fontColor: string;
  }

  /** xaxis theme config */
  xAxis: {
    /** font size of the label */
    labelFontSize: number;

    /** color of the label */
    labelColor: string;

    /** text anchor of the label */
    labelTextAnchor: string;

    /** color of stroke */
    strokeColor: string;

    /** color of ticke stroke */
    tickStrokeColor: string;

    /** width of stroke */
    strokeWidth: number;

    /** font size of tick */
    tickFontSize: number;
  }

  /** yaxis theme config */
  yAxis: {
    /** font size of the label */
    labelFontSize: number;

    /** color of the label */
    labelColor: string;

    /** text anchor of the label */
    labelTextAnchor: string;

    /** color of stroke */
    strokeColor: string;

    /** color of ticke stroke */
    tickStrokeColor: string;

    /** width of stroke */
    strokeWidth: number;

    /** font size of tick */
    tickFontSize: number;
  }

  headerBox: {
    /** Font size of the title */
    titleFontSize: number;

    /** Color of the title */
    titleColor: string;

    /** Font size of the description placed under the title */
    titleDescFontSize: number;

    /** Color of the description placed under the title */
    titleDescColor: string;

    /** Line height of the header box */
    lineHeight: number;

    /** Padding of the header box */
    padding: string;

    /** Default align of the text of the header box */
    defaultTextAlign: string;
  }
};

```

### Current default theme

```js
const COLORS = {
  GRAY: '#7c8a94',
  DARK: '#233142',
};

{
  colors: {
    /** see [d3-scale-chromatic](https://github.com/d3/d3-scale-chromatic) */
    category: schemeCategory10,
    sequential: {
      scheme: schemeBlues,
      interpolator: interpolateCool,
    },
  },
  globalStyle: {
    fontColor: COLORS.DARK,
  },
  xAxis: {
    labelFontSize: 15,
    labelColor: COLORS.DARK,
    labelTextAnchor: 'middle',
    strokeColor: COLORS.GRAY,
    tickStrokeColor: COLORS.GRAY,
    strokeWidth: 1.5,
    tickFontSize: 13,
  },
  yAxis: {
    labelFontSize: 15,
    labelColor: COLORS.DARK,
    labelTextAnchor: 'middle',
    strokeColor: COLORS.GRAY,
    tickStrokeColor: COLORS.GRAY,
    strokeWidth: 1.5,
    tickFontSize: 13,
  },
  headerBox: {
    titleFontSize: 19,
    titleColor: COLORS.DARK,
    titleDescFontSize: 15,
    titleDescColor: COLORS.GRAY,
    lineHeight: 1.3,
    padding: '0 1rem',
    defaultTextAlign: 'left',
  },
}
```
